section.title: Introduction to the Xubuntu web presence

simplesect.title: Xubuntu.org
simplesect.para: The website is the main output for end-users. The content on the website should be easily understandable and approachable.

The website is a WordPress instance on a server maintained by the Canonical IS. The website content is overseen and administrated by the Xubuntu website team. The website team can submit tickets to the Canonical IS for any problems. Bugs that are related to the website can be submitted on Launchpad, under the bugs for xubuntu-website.
The source code for the website is available at &branch;lp:xubuntu-website (the theme) and &branch;lp:xubuntu-website/plugins (the plugins).

para.emphasis: The Xubuntu wiki is used for some developer communication and serves as an archive for older release roadmaps and specification.
